name: Ruined Prison
description:
You are an engineer who wakes up in a space prison. The inmates have been infected by a space bug that inhabited a prisoner. The disease causes the victim to grow stronger and have a craving for human flesh. The inmates have grown strong enough to break through their cells and attack anything with human flesh.  Work solo or with any remaining engineer on board the ship to survive for as long as you can until rescue arrives… IF EVER.

Team Members: Leon Fernandes, Angelo Guererro, Khatim Javed, Yousef Ahmed
